des: "This is an easy espresso drink to make with your home espresso machine--steamed milk and a shot of espresso with vanilla flavoring."
ins: Pour milk into a steaming pitcher and heat to 145 degrees F to 165 degrees F (65 to 70 degrees C) using the steaming wand. Measure the vanilla syrup into a large coffee mug.  Brew espresso, then add to mug.  Pour the steamed milk into the mug, using a spoon to hold back the foam. Spoon foam over the top.
